subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony had 30 points and 10 rebounds, and Amar’e Stoudemire collected 14 points and 9 rebounds, as the Knicks held off a late run by Chicago for their sixth win of the season.
snippet: Carmelo Anthony had 30 points and 10 rebounds, and Amar’e Stoudemire collected 14 points and 9 rebounds, as the Knicks held off a late run by Chicago for their sixth win of the season.
